meanings.sent1: The ornithic features of the feathered creature were fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: The ornithic patterns on the bird's wings were beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The ornithic behavior of the robin made it the talk of the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her ornithic knowledge soared as she identified each bird by its unique call.
meanings.sent5: The ornithic colors of the peacock's feathers dazzled all who beheld them.

meanings.sent1: The ornithic research conducted by the scientist led to new bird discoveries.
meanings.sent2: Her ornithic studies focused on the migration patterns of different bird species.
meanings.sent3: The ornithic conference brought together experts from around the world.
meanings.sent4: His ornithic passion took flight as he explored the diverse avian species.
meanings.sent5: The ornithic field guide helped him identify the birds in his backyard.
